page.title: 08Local Industries No.1
page.content: Most of the industries around the Glinton and Helpston area are Service Industries.These contain things such as food shops,post offices and motor services.There are two post offices in the area,The one in Glinton is run by Mr. and Mrs Kernick.Our local motor service is near Arthur Mellows Village College.It is called Sycamore,this sells B.M.W cars and petrol.Another garage is Mr. Olivers he also sells second hand cars and petrol.Most of the industries are food shops.The nearest one to the Primary School is a shop owned by Mrs.Sheffield.This sells almost everything.The post offices both sell food.On High Sreet there is yet another food shop.This one is rather like Mrs Sheffields.Another type of industry is the manufacturing industry.In Helpston there is a paper mill.This sells paper and books too.
